Diet: Diet should be regulated taking into account the constitution of a person, 
habitat, season, age, disease, work profile, etc. It should be balanced and the 
quantity as per one’s digestive capacity. Food takes care of physical, mental, social 
and spiritual health. Therefore, it is important to know what to eat, when to eat, how to eat and how much to eat. It is also important to know the kinds of healthy and unhealthy foods.
